trans-unit.source: Allows a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"></xref> to create and manage execution contexts for its child activities.
This class cannot be inherited.
Marks an execution context as completed.
The workflow runtime enables this operation to succeed only if the activity in the execution context being completed is in the `Closed` state.

The `forcePersist` `Boolean` parameter indicates whether the completed execution context should be persisted so that it is available for retrieval at a later time (for example, for compensation to run).

The overload of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContextManager.CompleteExecutionContext%2A> that does not have the `forcePersist` parameter effectively uses a value of `false`, so that by default, completed execution contexts are not persisted.
The designated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref>.
childContext is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
childContext is not contained in this instance's .
Marks an execution context as completed.
The workflow runtime enables this operation to succeed only if the activity in the execution context being completed is in the `Closed` state.

The `forcePersist` `Boolean` parameter indicates whether the completed execution context should be persisted so that it is available for retrieval at a later time (for example, for compensation to run).

The overload of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContextManager.CompleteExecutionContext%2A> that does not have the `forcePersist` parameter effectively uses a value of `false`, so that by default, completed execution contexts are not persisted.
The designated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref>.
`Boolean` that indicates whether the completed context will be persisted.
childContext is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
childContext is not contained in this instance's .
Creates an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> for the designated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
The designated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
The created <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> for the designated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
activity is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
activity is not a valid child activity of owner of this context.
Represents the set of execution contexts, created by the current activity, that have not yet been completed.
The collection that contains the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref>(s) associated with this instance.
Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> associated with the designated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
Returns the first context for an activity with the same qualified name as the designated activity.
The designated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> associated with the designated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
activity is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual basic).
Retrieves the persisted <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> corresponding to the designated <xref href="System.Guid"></xref>.
The designated <xref href="System.Guid"></xref>.
The persisted <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> corresponding to the designated <xref href="System.Guid"></xref>.
Represents the set of execution contexts, created by the current activity, that have been completed and were persisted upon their completion.
The collection of type <xref href="System.Guid"></xref> that represents the set of all persisted <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref>.
